relation: i definitely feel safe on campus.
sinclair is very reasonably priced even for non montgomery county residents.
i can't really rate this as i only occasionally purchase a soda or snack from the vending machine but they do have a good selection.
sinclair is a community college with no on campus housing however its only a 5-30 minute drive from anywhere in the dayton are including springfield.
students are expected to do the work however if you put in effort and your instructors see that they will be willing to help you out if you get stuck on something.
don't be afraid because strangers are willing to help you.

sinclair has many amazing instructors who truly care about their students. they want students to succeed and the instructors will help you out in any way they can. i highly recommend sinclair for anyone who is looking for a great two year school!
pageTitle: Sinclair Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {304102=In my opinion, I transferred from another college to Sinclair in September of 2011, and have found that Sinclair has exceeded my speculations in terms of scholastic and performance skills. The Professors at Sinclair are dedicated and willing to help you out in any level of your academic achievement, and will g go out of their way to make sure you truly understand what you are expected to learn in your field, and also in the prerequisite courses. If I were to start all over again, I would do it the same way, making Sinclair my first choice in terms of academic achievement, academic counseling and academic performance., 106492=Sinclair is a diverse, well-established community college that offers a multitude of degrees. They are both regionally and nationally accredited in their nursing program. Best of all, they are converting to semesters starting Fall 2012., 354418=Irish dance competition every year. textAfterTable: Be ready to study and do homework! Bang for the buck Sinclair is a Community College, it offers the cheap tuition but with a fantastic curriculum. Am enjoying being here It is small so you get to know your fellow students. With a small population teachers have time for one on one help and are glad to work with you. Am learning a lot Sinclair offers a broad spectrum of all types of classes and is accredited and ranked as one of the best community colleges in the country. Login to rate or flag the reviews Ann from Huber Heights, OH 06/22/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 104 Categories Comments Great for these types of students It has a great preschool for ages three to five year
